name: The People’s Coin
description: The People’s Coin is a community-driven project that champions Charitable Giving initiatives, providing a universal platform that will connect the many various communities within the space by utilizing decentralized blockchain technologies. The PEEPS platform hosts a robust ecosystem that will bridge the current gap between those numerous charitable organizations, foundations, and fundraising campaigns by providing the much needed ability to accept a universal cryptocurrency that’s specifically designed for any and all types of donations.
